ape game athi padi sihil nil diya piri ala dola lin wala jalaya ethek kal waw diyen nahamin siti dolayata aushadhayak wiya.ape game wel eliya pisagena hamana manda pawana dolayage gathata behewin suwadayaka wiya.game gaswal saha sundara badi kala kutti dolayage nethata rasanjanayakma wiya.dolaya apewa gamatada game jiwathwuna apatada behewin alum kaleya.gamata paminida sitama dolaya ge wruththiya jiwithaye shighra wardhanayak apa wisin dakna ladi.kalaya gathawi athata mudal tikak labenawita ewakata aadhunika gayakayanta thibuna pissuwak wu eeka pudgala prasangayak pawathwima dolaya ge oluwatada gasuweya.uge aasawa nisa ape game kollan ekathuwi redi mole rangahala wenkarawagena prasangaya sanwidhanaya karadimen nonawathi prasangaya dinaye game okkoma andagasagena balannatada giyemu.me kalaya wanawita uuta thawa sagayekda ekwi sitiyeya.sunil namwu uuda paren ahula genawith dama thibu ekeki.sunil sarpina kibod saha ee wargaye wenath wadya bhanda itha mihirata wadanaya kaleya.shrathiya rakagena niwaradi swarasthanawala pihita me dedena gayana wayana andama api washiwuwak men bala sitiyemu.kotinma un dennage ekathuwa kiri muhudata sanda pawwak men sundara wiya.

samaja thathwaya[sanskaranaya] samaja thathwaya padanam karagena andum bhawithawu aakaraya itha aatha yugayata enam gothrika yugayan kara adi yanabawa manawa widyagnyayan pawasayi.adapawa jiwathwana atham prathamika jana kandayam thula samaja thathwaya padanam karagena andum bhawithaye wenaskam pawathi.udaharana lesa gothrika nayakaya koti thath diwi sam aadi parisaraye sitina bhayanaka sathunge sharira kotas thama andum ha sambandhakaragena atha.ee owunge wirathwaya gambhirathwaya pradarshanaya kirimatayi.gothrika yugayen shishtacharagatha yugayata piwisimath samaga mema samaja thathwayan thawath wardhanaya wiya.samaja panthiya kulaya aadi panamkaragena andum bhawithaye pahadili wenasak daknata labe.
eelangata apita hamuwanne polgahawela dumriya sthanayayi.
